column4: yo guys im trying to open firefox.. it says its already open..... is there something i can enter in terminal to close firefox?
try starting with 'ps aux | grep -i firefox'
what came up? pastebin it pls and give me the resultant url.
sure, you can try 'killall -9 firefox-bin' or you can get the numbers from the far left column and 'kill -9' them
